creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: three large characters written horizontally across long sheet; two smaller, vertical characters (signature) at far L; vertical rectangular intaglio stamp at R center; square intaglio stamp at LL, just under signature; partial gold border along top L edge
markings: R center, rectangular intaglio seal; LLC, square intaglio seal: 藤原永則之印
title: Do not Betray Humaneness
